price: (51) And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before,[891] and We were of him well-Knowing
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: [891]- i.e., before Moses.  Allāh had guided him from early youth.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
